column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I only have one complaint about this place
column2: I felt rushed. We sat down ordered a drink and went over the menu
column3: the waiter came back and we gave him our order.  Food was great
column4: service was great and didn't have that long of a wait considering how busy it was. We finished our drink just after our meals
column5: we were ready for another one but instead came our check. He didn't give us enough time to  get a word out and request a second round.  So we paid our bill and left. Food was on point and so was the drink.
